WorkItem.ClosedComment: meaningless issue Rawr doesn't use stats weightings.
WorkItem.Description: 1. Stat priorityCurrent stat prority for moonkin is:no 4T14Hit (5099) > Haste softcap (5273) > Crit > Haste > Mastery4T14Hit (5099) > Haste softcap (3706 ) > Crit > Haste > MasteryBut current model priority look like:Hit  > Haste > Crit > > Mastery2. Hit raitingHit MUST be close to 5100. Otherwise spell can miss in importent moment. But I received result 5070 and less. Sorry for poor English :)
WorkItem.Summary: Moonkin stat prority and haste softcap

Comments.Message:
So what if that is the stats priority. Rawr DOES NOT and NEVER HAS used stats priority numbers. Rawr calculates your dps from each ability based on your equipped stats. Since the models are out of date the suggestions will be completely wrong as they are using old dps formulae.

So this issue is meaningless and as such I'll close it.
